website_summaries.verdict: Can't decide between a food processor and a blender? Now you don't have to choose.
pros: Five-cup BPA-free food processor bowl attachment
Blender and food chopper have seven speeds, including three pre-programmed settings

customer_reviews.title: Exploding Blender :(
customer_reviews.text: This blender exploded on my wife on only its third use. A piece of glass the size of a golf ball shot out of the pitcher approximately 10 feet away. The glass sliced her finger but could have done much worse if she was standing somewhere else or if anyone else had been in the room. The blender only contained yogurt, milk, a banana and five strawberries and was on a medium setting. After only five seconds, the blender exploded. Amazon was very helpful in promptly refunding. We will not buy any more Oster products and advise against buying any yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Joel E Soroos

customer_reviews.title: I loved this blender when I first bought but I woke ...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blender when I first bought but I woke up this morning to make my daily smoothie and it won't spin. I ordered it on February 27, 2018 and today is July 16, 2018. Less than 6 months old. What I shame, as I said I loved it but not if it is going to break within 6 month of being purchased ;(  Since my last post I reached out to Amazon and they in turn reached out to the vendor ( my return window thu Amazaon had expired) they replace my blender within 2 days!! I am so happy! I really hope this one lasts more than 6 months. :) keeping my fingers crossed!!
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: they are amazing. Chopping and blending very well I recommend it ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried the food processing and the milkshake mug , they are amazing. Chopping and blending very well I recommend it ❤️ The price is so good , but don't use the dishwasher to clean it I use the food processor to made Tabbouleh Which I press the low button and it chopped very goon not soo smooth like the chop button I chpoed 10 bunch of parsley onely in 30 Minutes I am in love with my food processor
customer_reviews.author: Fatemoo

customer_reviews.title: After 6 months product leaks uncontrollably, ineligible for return or product support.
customer_reviews.text: Well this blender worked pretty well until today when it leaked my entire smoothie out the bottom of the pitcher, wasting about $3 of fruit and veggies. After careful inspection I can find nothing wrong with it other than it leaks. I didn't want one of the cheap $30 blenders because this always happens. I guess 70 bucks still isn't enough to buy a product that lasts more than 6 months. GREAT, I hate smoothies anyway and I didn't lose any weight. I'm going to angrily eat a whole meat lovers pizza washed down with a 12-pack of my favorite IPA. If I die of a heart attack it's this lousy, inferior blender's fault!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex & Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve owned a few bargain blenders over the years and never knew what it felt like to own a “semi-pro” blender/food processor until I finally pulled the trigger on this one. From the get go I could tell just by the sound and feel that this processor is what you get when you spend a little extra. First big test was large chunks of cooked chicken breast and this perfectly chopped them and the added ingredients for a well blended chicken salad. Next test was the salsa function which worked well to chop and blend the ingredients without grinding them to a paste. The parts (excluding base) all separate easily for safe cleaning in the dishwasher.
customer_reviews.author: Justin L

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for a few months then the motor, not the blades sounded like it was crushing glass. Remove the glass container and the blades and tested out the motor. Sound was terrible...just like I said above, the motor sounded like it was crushing glass. Now I have to purchase something else. Really unhappy. I use to buy Black & Decker blenders and should have stayed with them as they worked beautifully for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Having a high quality blender like this Oster Pro 1200 is a life changer. It blends perfectly, is quieter than my previous blenders, and the additional food processor and smoothie cup make an awesome product even better. We use it all the time for a variety of foods and it doesn't disappoint. It is easy to clean and easy to use. I love it that the lid never warps and fits securely on the blender. Every blender I've ever had or seen previously has a flimsy lid that warps with washing and is difficult to get properly seated on the top of the blender. Not this one. I can't think of anything I would improve. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: PearlyWhites

customer_reviews.title: Rubber gasket replacements are unavailable from Oster
customer_reviews.text: Oster refuses to provide replacement rubber gaskets for this product. They have been out of stock for several months. There are similar complaints about this on the Oster website as well. We purchased this item Silicone replacement gasket seals Wide mouth rings (Orange) Pack of 6  As a replacement and have used it successfully. Conceivably, any 3.75" diameter rubber gasket should work. It doesn't quite slide into place like the original, but we didn't have any leaks. Keep this in mind before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender for a Great Price and it's Glass!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this blender. So far I have made almond milk, protein shakes, green smoothies, fresh salsa, and frozen strawberry daiquiris. Everything has turned out amazing! This is a powerful blender and crushes ice in just seconds. For the price, I am very happy. I'm so glad I got this instead of the more expensive blenders I was considering. It is very noisy, so once my toddler goes to sleep I can't use it which is sightly annoying, but I can live with that because I'm sure a lot of blenders are just as noisy. Oh, and it is glass which cleans so well and just seems healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Howard

customer_reviews.title: A very handy and practical blender kit
customer_reviews.text: I mainly got this blender because I want to make random shakes and bulletproof coffee. While its not rated for hot liquids, it has no issue blending hot coffee for me. I don't make a scolding hot cup and I don't run the blender for more than 15s and try to keep the hot coffee in the jar for less than 60s. I'm sure if I immediately when from hot to cold and vice versa I'd break the jar, so I don't. The regular shake attachment I have mixed reviews on because its air tight and pressure builds up fast. Only cold stuff in this one. I've been using this blender for months now without issue
customer_reviews.author: James415

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't leak, high quality blender, ordinary food processor
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing oster blender i had watched/ read a lot of reviews I was worried that the blender leaks ( it doesnt leak at all). I even opened the blade and re assemble it to test for leaking ! It Does not leak! For this budget oster was my best option with 1200 watts and a glass jar! You cant find better than this! I used fresh fruit and some frozen fruit for blending and it does the blending efficiently! The food processor is of lower quality compared to the blender ( but for my use which is minimal is completely acceptable and good)..... the chopping was consistent and quick !
customer_reviews.author: ghm

customer_reviews.title: The blender is fine but the food processor attachments worked twice and then ...
customer_reviews.text: The blender is fine but the food processor attachments worked twice and then the blade wouldn't spin. So, its really a pricey blender. Useless as a a food processor. REALLY poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blender with a bonus food processor
customer_reviews.text: It also comes with a smoothie cup, which I didn't think I'd use. Well, I use it nearly every day now. This powerful blender tackles ice without any hesitation. The food processor is perfect for a quick salsa and for grating or slicing vegetables rapidly. The only caveat is that one is advised to not run the food processor at full power, only at medium. It's not made to handle dough, which was a little disappointing. The food processor blade is thin and light-weight. I may update on how it fairs processing some heavier foods.
customer_reviews.author: RoamingChile

customer_reviews.title: Food processor adapter doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Bought this over a year ago. Use the blender all the time, works great. Went to use the food processor attachment for the first time and the shaft does not turn the blade. Tried turning the shaft with a screw driver and the blade does not turn. The food processor adapter must be broken. Too late for warranty service and the food processor $14.99 is no longer available so I am stuck.
customer_reviews.author: SC

customer_reviews.title: Blender worked for less than 2 mo. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.text: Was excited to order this blender set for smoothies. Worked great, until a month & a half after receiving, the blender broke down. When button is pressed, the motor will rev, but the blades won’t move. Turned off, unplugged & looked under it, & there is a screw that is loose, but when try to tighten, it only spins on the access, indicating that the screw is stripped. Accessed Amazon support, & still have not heard from an associate. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: Rodin

customer_reviews.title: Broke in two months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item two months ago and the food processor unit broke. I believe I used it between 4 and 6 times, making hummus. It seems as if the interior of the blending unit is all plastic - and that it wore down/stripped in this short amount of time. It's too bad, because it made some great hummus and is really easy to clean. It broke outside of my return window with Amazon - I've logged a complaint with Oster, hopefully their customer service is better than the product design!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: No O-ring for the smoothie cap, it spilled on ...
customer_reviews.text: No O-ring for the smoothie cap, it spilled on everything everywhere you go. Very inconvenient and dissatisfied. Incomplete product!
customer_reviews.author: alicehua

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. It is very sharp
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. It is very sharp. I make Indian crepes. I blend rice and lentals(Udid Dal). They have to be very fine grinded and it works fine for it. So, my expectations have been met perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is junk. I bought this over a year ago but it’s been sitting in the box. I finally decided to start using it for smoothies as I’m trying out this new diet. I would use it 3-4 times a week just to make smoothies where I’m just blending veggies and chopped fruits. I have only been using it for the past 3 weeks and it broke! It still turns on and “blend” but it just makes the noise but the blades aren’t moving at all so therefore not actually blending. Terrible product. Invest more in a better quality blender that actually blends better and quicker than this. I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: BtownGrl

customer_reviews.title: Faulty design, don’t waist your money!
customer_reviews.text: Faulty design of food processor attachment that has metal gear that operates plastic gears. It broke on my 1st use while still under warranty, so after contacting the company and waiting a month I got a replacement part, later On 3rd use the same part the plastic gears On the inside disintegrated, while processing light food nothing too hard and following the manufacturer instructions, see attached photos, now I have to keep replacing that food processing motor drive attachment or just ditch the entire thing!!
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: No adequate user's manual for blender and none for the food processor
customer_reviews.text: When I got the blender and opened it up, all I found was a folded sheet of paper for operation of the blender. It said nothing of the food processor that came with it. It wasn't really a user's manual! I'm not tech savvy so I really needed instructions. So I returned it. I found another Oster product that I believe is fairly new. The Oster Texture Select Master Series. I wanted a blender with a glass jar so I took a chance. I was delighted when the first thing I saw was a user's manual and a few recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela W.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a blender
customer_reviews.text: This is a a great little blender. It will chop up frozen fruit but you will have to continue to chop it up. I usually just unfreeze my smoothie bags the night before so there easy to blend in the morning. I have not used the food processor yet but my favorite is the cup attachment. It does say not to use in dishwasher but i clean ours in the dishwasher on the top shelf and have not had any issues. I will update review once we use the food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Keesha.Lunger

customer_reviews.title: Terrible food processor
customer_reviews.text: Purely as a blender, this is mostly OK, but as a food processor it's awful. The shredding disc's center contact and its attachment are made of soft plastic so they're clearly not meant to be used -- just there for the box art. First time I tried to use the shredding disc, it stripped its adapter and they started spinning fused together (shedding bits of plastic into the bowl in the process). I bought this specifically because it supposed to be a combo unit; if the food processor is junk then that defeats the purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Was Happy with this awesome product - Oster Pro 1200  now disappointed
customer_reviews.text: REVISED review. I still love the blender but the food processor shaft failed after about a year and I could not find a replacement. Because I loved the unit I decided to just buy a new one. I started to read bad reviews and just decided to return and find a better combo unit. I’m still looking for a unit that will hold up. Nothing convincing yet. Blender still works. Still love the glass jar. Love this blender/food processor. Powerful and easy to use and clean. Love the glass blender jar. Wish food processor pitcher was glass also. My last blender was Oster and I’m very satisfied with this replacement/upgrade—food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Milltop

customer_reviews.title: A powerhouse multi function blender with a glass container.
customer_reviews.text: A powerhouse multi function blender with a glass container. I like the milkshake mode that reverses the blades back and forth. Smoothie mode blast anything we've put in it from ice to veggies and fruit. Salsa mode has a slower 3 power on/off to lightly chop up your salsa in the food processor. Easy to use but will get very loud on fast blend settings. A little bit of a pain to clean and the processor adapter says "do not submerse in liquid" in the manual but I imagine that's due to the bearing or bushing in it? Have not used the cup yet.
customer_reviews.author: JstaRnr

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Information
customer_reviews.text: After assembly, before using a small tab on the base broke. Attempts to reach customer service by telephone went unanswered for over 45 minutes. The unit then proved unuseable after coming apart during usage and spraying a good portion of the kitchen with it's contents. This is the second Osterizer blender, and the design in comparison to others in the market are not items that I will forget or even bother to return. Instead it will be used as a mental reminder to investigate any product thoroughly before purchasing, especially on the internet. It is a good lesson to learn. In addition, the material is listed as "brushed nickel". It is in reality plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Love the smoothie cup!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim to replace a Cuisinart blender/food processor that I got at Costco a few years ago. I hated just about everything about the Cuisinart, but mainly the buttons were very non-responsive, and it was terrible at making smoothies. So, when I received the Oster 1200, I immediately made a smoothie--fantastic! You just fill the cup, transfer the blade, put the cup on the base, and press the smoothie button. The blender goes into a cycle that reverses a few times, then goes into high speed--takes a 2-3 minutes, and when it is done--perfectly blended smoothie!
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and seller
customer_reviews.text: This product is a complete disaster. I received a duplicate order, I don't know how. In order to return the second one I have to go 20 miles. This has nothing to do with the quality of the product. That's another story: It does not work. Do not buy if you want to slice. While slicing a carrot the last piece got wedged between the slicer and jar and must have stripped out some gears or adaptors. I can't see anything wrong but the slicer will not turn. What? I trusted Oster to work. I will not be dealing with Amazon anymore either. Too complicated and distant. Walmart, Menards easy to deal with.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin G. Bayless

customer_reviews.title: good expression of blender evolution
customer_reviews.text: smoothie setting REALLY noisy, i now make day's smoothie the night before out of consideration for apt. neighbors- but love the built in reverse mode- reverse spin not manual, you have no control except in smoothie setting- but blends like a dream- food processor pretty darn good- both blender and processor disassemble to clean really nicely- smoothie setting only setting only timed setting - other settings you have to stop- can handle hot liquids and meat well- love the glass on blender, processor is plastic- overall very well designed and powerful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good...
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t experienced any of the problems that I read in some of the reviews. I think my old blender was basically giving up before it finally stopped working as some of the vegetables I blended weren’t being blended real good. I make a drink mix out of red onions, ginger, garlic cubanelle and poblano peppers so my blender gets a real workout. I was having to use the highest level in the old one but noticed I could get a great blend using only the lowest level. Pleasant surprise for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Tews

customer_reviews.title: impossible to get replacement parts
customer_reviews.text: The blender works like a charm, however, it was purchased primarily to use as a food processor. The lid for the food processor is make of thin plastic, and the ears that hold it closed are prone to breakage. This might be a forgivable issue, however, replacement parts are unavailable, making the purchase pointless. Do not buy if you actually intend on using this item as a food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer M. Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender but has a week spot
customer_reviews.text: This blender is great! I mostly use the food processor for making peanut butter. As long as you don't do more than a cup at a time and don't do to many consecutive cups, it works great. The weakness comes in if you break either of the two conditions above you will destroy the little clutch piece that makes the blades spin. On the up side, over the last 2 years I've gone through two of the clutch thingies and Oster has replaced them both times with no issues. They were slow to respond this last time but I suspect that was because of the COVID19 pandemic. You have to give everyone a little slack these days
customer_reviews.author: Joe Croft

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty powerful blender
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty powerful blender. Works better than the single blade versions and I have had two Osters before. The smoothie cup is plastic and all scratched after only half a year using it once a week at most. But the food processor doesn't work. I bought this from Amazon Warehouse Deals and it took me several months to try out the food processor and I tried everything to get it to work but something is definitely wrong with it. I haven't had much luck with the Warehouse Deals lately. Something's always missing or broken.
customer_reviews.author: Suza

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy! Food processor broke on first use!
customer_reviews.text: Disaster! Food processor broke on the first try to days after the return window expired! I’m so angry because I thought I was investing in a well-known brand at a price that I could trust. Don’t buy this there is no reason why that food processor unraveled and fell apart. The mechanisms just tore open! I didn’t even actually get to process the food. Thus happened just 2 days after the "return window" expired. The blender still works, and works well, but I am so disappointed that I paid extra for the food processor aspect, and it doesn't work. I will stay away from Oster products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Doug E. Phre$h

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy to use, could add a very small jar for salsa/Chutney
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for close to 6 months. The experience so far has been great. I like that the slicer and grater is one reversible pc rather than 2 pcs which take up space. The blender performance is great, it also has special modes for milk shake and food chop/salsa which run the blade in both directions, which is awesome. The glass jar that comes with the product is too thick and heavy. They should provide a smaller jar than the blender bottle for making small amounts of Indian chutneys and salsa.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Product is by far better than the ones you get for 19.99 at local retailers. Doesn't have as many speeds as the cheaper one I had before. The nice part is the glass top and then it comes with a food chopper/processor. The only things I don't care for are the noise when using and the actual base is plastic. When you look at this product I would have thought it was stainless and was disappointed to find out it was plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Mystry Man

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I use the blender daily..mostly for green smoothies. It blends very smooth with no chunks left. I haven't used the food processor yet. The only reason I didn't give 5-stars is that it's loud. But for the price will accept. I'd highly recommend. Update 4/28/2020 - changed from 4 to 1-star... I have been shopping for a replacement seal for the past 2 years...can’t find them anywhere!! Not even direct with Oster! I’ve tried substituting other seals but none have worked. My son cut a styrofoam plate to use as a seal, it works but can only use 1-2 times before it cracks. The blender is useless with no seal!
customer_reviews.author: MCTexas

customer_reviews.title: Better than the Ninja!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender! I had a ninja for four years and I thought it was great, but it broke and I purchased this as a deal of the day to replace it. This blender works so much better than my ninja even did! It makes smoothies in just seconds and cleaning it is so easy it's almost fun. I've only had it a couple of weeks so I can't speak on longevity, but so far I love it! I don't think it's any louder than my ninja was, which was a concern for me after reading other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: eawFF5

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Works great. We like that it has a food processor and blender with one base. We have limited cupboard space. We make hummus in the processor and it grinds it very smooth. My daughter makes smoothies in the blender, and it doesn't leave ice chunks. Only drawback is that it's very loud. But it works! I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Page Graham

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice blender and food processor. It is easy to use, looks sleek, and works well. The food processor will definitely chop something up, so be careful! I've also made milkshakes with this, and the standard blade works just fine! DON"T buy the small milkshake blade for this, as it will not fit. Amazon is advertising this with the milkshake blade as a bundle, however the two will not work together. I had to send mine back. Overall, a great purchase and a fair price. I expect many years to come from this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to find a compact, easy to clean and use food processor that didn't take up loads of space on my counter. It also made decent smoothies and green concoctions for my husband and me. Much to my chagrin and annoyance, however, at about 4.5 months of use 4-6X/week, the green/ frozen smoothies' button stopped operating. At 6 months, something happened to the connection to the base so I can no longer securely fit the bowl on the machine. It is now completely unusable- a total waste of money. I am so sad to have things end this way. I thought it was going to remain a great little machine.
customer_reviews.author: E. H. Conerly

customer_reviews.title: A great blender
customer_reviews.text: This is really a solid blender. It is worth noting that the shell is not metal. It is plastic designed to look like metal. Other than that it has been great. We have been using it for about a month and we have had no problems. We have blended frozen ingredients and it goes through them with no difficulty. It blends evenly and quickly even when it is nearly full. It has lots of buttons that aren't really needed and only result in me having to read a bunch of labels to find the button I want. In almost all cases all I want is low, medium, and tiny spinning vortex of death and dismemberment.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Topper

customer_reviews.title: Died in 3 years, but probably get another on
customer_reviews.text: The motor/base died a little more than 3 years, which coincidentally is the length of Oster's warranty :-/. Previously to this I had a cheap plastic base blender that lasted 10+ years before I gave it away (and I used it at least once a week for 10 years). But I'll probably buy this model again because it uses a glass blender jar and it also has a food processor attachment- finding those two things in a combo blender product is incredibly hard to find (and a platic blender jar just feels cheap).
customer_reviews.author: why2jjj

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Blender.
customer_reviews.text: Super quiet, very durable, just what I expected from Oster, a brand that's been around my household since the 1950's. I love that the speed ramps up slowly when you start on "LOW", no need to put the lid on for my daily banana smoothie. (2 Bananas, 2 eggs, 2 Tbsp Sugar, 2 Tbsp Light Cream, 1/2 cup 2% Milk, 4-6 Ice Cubes) YUM!!
customer_reviews.author: Hands Of Gold

customer_reviews.title: I like how the blender surges it's blades to help dislodge ...
customer_reviews.text: Replaced my old Cuisinart blender and food processor with this 1 product and it's a big space saver. Also, it's so much more powerful than my old appliances. I like how the blender surges it's blades to help dislodge contents that haven't reached the bottom yet. I've never had a Vitamin or Blentec, but for the price, this is still a major upgrade in performance for me. I make everything from smoothies to blender breads to salsas in it and I'm happy with my purchase so far. Love how you can remove the bottom blade housing so easily to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: BusyMom

customer_reviews.title: Uses specially designed gasket and replacements aren't available
customer_reviews.text: The machine works great. I love that the blender jar is glass instead of plastic. HOWEVER, it only comes with 1 gasket, called a locking sealing ring, and it is impossible to obtain replacements. If the gasket is lost or broken you're left with high quality unusable trash.
customer_reviews.author: lucycmorr

customer_reviews.title: Great blender for smoothies. Great blender.
customer_reviews.text: My B&D blender wore out, started smoking and melting plastic after years of use. This seemed like a highly-rated affordable replacement. It's WAAAYY better than what I had. The Smoothie setting auto-reverses 3-4 times to mix in all the ingredients before blending everything at increasing speeds. I no longer have to manually pulse and wait for the fruit to settle back down to the blades. It's amazingly awesome and I never have chunks of frozen fruit anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Frogger

customer_reviews.title: Broke during first use
customer_reviews.text: First time using it, I the food processor to make almond butter and it broke after a few minutes. The metal piece separated from the plastic housing and the blades wouldn’t logger turn. Very frustrated and customer service is M-F, and I ended up returning it because If it broke once after one use, I didn’t want to keep the same brand—since my main reason for wanting it was the processor.
customer_reviews.author: Jen RH

customer_reviews.title: A good multi-function appliance!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not enough of a cook to own a full-scale food processor, but this multi-function machine is very handy. I'm particularly fond of the "smoothie" container, since I do a lot of them. It's nice to make it and take it in the same container (you switch out the cover with the blades for a plain cover, with a slidable opening). The controls are good; so far, I'm impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hinds

customer_reviews.title: Chopper was chopped on first use!
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE to give this 1 star, I am so disappointed you could not imagine, the blender is great, it has a lot of power and I even bragged about it, today I was using the chopper for the first time, it just broke, I mean it broke as in dismantled horrible, and it's not like I was chopping wood or rocks, just 3 simple thin leaves of ham for an omelette, seriously? I am going to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Machado O. Angel Eduardo

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this one!!
customer_reviews.text: It only took three times using the food processor for it to stop working completely (three separate spins, now nothing). I've been trying to get in touch with customer service for months now so I can have it repaired or replaced, and I have still had no luck. Either no one picks up the phone (for hours!), or I am greeted with a disconnected dial tone. I seriously do not recommend this product or any other from this company!
customer_reviews.author: Lobna

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power
customer_reviews.text: Finally replaced a 25+ year old Oster blender that was a work horse. This one works great - lousy lid! Liquids will spit up thru the slots in the lid. Very poor lid design. I cover lid with a folded paper towel and hold it there until finished blending 'whatever.' Pain in the arse but works and blender suitable for my purpose so will not return item.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia

customer_reviews.title: Food Processor Broke after 20 uses
customer_reviews.text: I have had this blender/food processor for about 18 month. I almost never use the blender, so have no strong opinions on it. I LOVED the food processor and have used it about 20 times. Most of that in the last six months. Today, I loaded it up to make pesto but the unit suddenly won't sit right and the teeth of the rotation piece, won't catch within the blade so it just won't work. I realize 18 months is along time, but 20 uses is not nearly enough to have stripped the teeth. Super bummed about it...and the wasted basil.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Crawfod

customer_reviews.title: A couple of weeks passed the return window and it just stopped working :(
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. I'm just barely passed the return date and it broke! Used only a handful of times I'm not happy. I wonder if it was defective since I had a problem the first time I used it to get the blade to go around. I should have sent it back then. :(
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: O-Ring not available for parts replacements
customer_reviews.text: Blender is awesome, but after 2 weeks of use, the O-ring broke. I am unable to find a replacement here on Amazon (don't purchase the one amazon recommends because it doesn't fit this product) nor on Oster website. the O-Ring is not available for weeks and how to know when it will be. This little part is just making the whole experience annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Herbert

customer_reviews.title: DANGEROUS - blade broke off in smoothie after 9 months moderate use
customer_reviews.text: This was an excellent product until today, when after 9 months of using it to make about 5 smoothies a week, the blade broke off while I was making a smoothie. Thank god I heard the strange sound of the metal rattling about, and did not serve it to my 3 year old son. Horror. I have used this to blend bananas and frozen strawberries with water, stored it indoors, and used it to make about 5 smoothies a week. That is to say, I have done nothing outside the normal use of this product that would lead to heavy wear and tear. There is obviously something very wrong with the materials used in this blade component. BE WARNED.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay

customer_reviews.title: I totally love this!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with this blender the first time I used it. I LOVE the "smoothie" function. After adding all of your ingredients you simply press the "smoothie" button. The blender shuts off when the smoothie is thoroughly mixed/blended. Incredible! Love the food processor, too! All three of my children (married) have now purchased this and they, too, love it!
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Worked for maybe the first couple of times, but then started "walking" across the counters. It sounds like a jet taking off and will give me a headache because it is so loud. I have had it since July 2018 and it stopped working around February 2019. It still sounds terrible, but the blades no longer move to blend/process food. Please avoid this blender at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and load
customer_reviews.text: Very loud - like a rocket ship that’s about to take off. Food processor’s plastic lid is rather thin. The fastening slots broke, so you have to hold the lid down when the machine works. If you’ve washed the bottom of the food processor properly detaching the rotating mechanism and then forgot to secure it in plastic slots, then you are guaranteed to brake the plastic cup. I would prefer all the plastic cups replaced with glass.
customer_reviews.author: Sergei

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I did
customer_reviews.text: I did not intend to order this specific blender. When it came in I decided to open it and check it out. I am glad that I did. I have a medical condition that requires me to juice or puree all of my food. This appliance is great and does more than I need it to. One setting will turn the blade in one direction and then the opposite. This results in a better blended food. The seller has e-mailed me to make sure that I received it and am pleased with it. Would highly recommend product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: super quality product, glass, programmed buttons save time, high power motor!
customer_reviews.text: amazing programmed motor. This automatically starts to mix, reverses direction, speeds up, slows down. the programmed smoothie buttons save me a ton of time and hassle when i jam pack the blender with all my fruits, Nori, protein, avocado, spinach, kale. Turns this stuff into perfectly smooth delicious smoothie in a minute or two. Extremely powerful motor, glass jar. This is a super quality product that i would gladly pay a premium for.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Powerful glass blender. (For its price)
customer_reviews.text: For its price, it really gets the job done. And it's super easy to switch between the containers. I've had the product for over 3 months now, and I've had nothing but good results from it. I had an old blender that I broke from filling it up with to much ice, I had that fear that I would break this one too with over fill of hard objects. But this blender does not stop, I quickly got over my fear of breaking this new blender from how much it can handle. And to anyone asking, yes this is made out of glass. This product is great for those not wanting to spend to much on a new blender.
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Loud and alignment isn't the best.
customer_reviews.text: This blender works well, but it isn't aligned properly. even with the rubber grommet on occasion there can be light leakage with heavy blending. It is also very loud, so don't think about using it late at night or early in the morning. The food processor attachment is my favorite thing about this blender, making it easy to make pastes and hummus.
customer_reviews.author: Bobert

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this blender because our old, old, did I mention old? Stopped working and we did some research and this blender came up with some good reviews and was priced reasonably too! So what better way to break it in then smoothies with your daughter!! So delicious, so refreshing! Definitely a great addition to our kitchen appliances!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A. Brothers

customer_reviews.title: Noisy but this blender works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful blender that certainly does the job. We use it mostly to make smoothies that include frozen fruit and the blender doesn't skip a beat. The result is always a perfect smoothie. I do cover my ears when running this blender though because it's one loud machine. We've had it now for two years and never had a problem. We give it three stars for cleaning because the blades are very sharp and point at angles so it's very easy to get 'stung'. Still, this is one excellent blender.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny East

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender & Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: SO Easy to use!! LOVE the pre installed smoothie, milkshake and salsa buttons. I have enjoyed perfect smoothies every morning! put your ingredients in, cover and hit the smoothie button! Pour into smoothie mug and go!! I make extra for my finance! I have made a few milkshakes and they have been so creamy and smooth each time. It is a little loud, but no more than regular blenders. Just tried the food processor and made some amazing potato chips! Looking forward to making salsa!! The glass blender is the perfect size and everything is easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this to any home cook even a beginner like me!!!
customer_reviews.author: gary heyl

customer_reviews.title: Good Blender
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I make a lot of juice from frozen fruit pulp. When I put it on the frozen fruit or smoothie setting in 30 seconds or less I have perfectly blended juice. The smoothie attachment it great. Careful; it’s alil top heavy but it’s still good. It’s easy to use, easy to clean. I loved that it’s a food processor, a blender, and smoothie maker. I haven’t used the food processor yet... so I can’t rate it.
customer_reviews.author: MomOfDosChachos

customer_reviews.title: Used three times then broke
customer_reviews.text: I liked this because it was relativly cheap and had many high reviews. It has plenty of power and is easy to clean. After using it four times the drive shaft broke inside of the blender. Now I see why it is so cheap yu get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: wanted a blender, food processer is a nice bonus
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my blender and wanted one that could make a decent smoothie. THis one came with additional food processor. I'm happy with the performance of both. I'll give the blender function a 90% rating, because the blender base is a little narrow for thick smoothies. The food processor is 80%. It works good enough for most slicing, grating and grinding, though no flexibility on fineness. BUT, considering the price, it's very good value and meets most of my needs.
customer_reviews.author: karen b.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I waited too long before trying mine and by that time it was too late to return it. I bought it for the sole purpose of making smoothies and celery juice but unfortunately it sucks so much I can barely do either. I have to add way more liquid than I'd like just to get it to blend the Frozen fruit. Stuff is always getting stuck and won't blend and I have to continually stop it, manually mix stuff around, and repeat. Also it's extremely loud.
customer_reviews.author: Keli

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color!  The quality I have not yet tried it, but should be great!
customer_reviews.text: The posting in Walmart called for a Brushed Nickel blender, and instead I received Chrome. I know it might seem a frivolous complaint, but I chose the blender by color specifically, to go with the rest of my kitchen. I have three choices, brushed nickel, red, or black. Chrome just makes it all look wrong. Maybe I can return it and get it in Black... I'll try that next!
customer_reviews.author: Isabelita

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this blender! Blends really well and leaves my smoothies very thin (which I love). Easy to store and easy to clean. Looks great if you want to leave it on the counter too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great blender
customer_reviews.text: When they say pro it is pro. So many options and so powerful. But the noise though, it's extremely loud! If you trying to find an excellent blender this is the one. but if you want a very low noise one, i suggest you look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: and I couldn't be happier. The blender is powerful enough to make green ...
customer_reviews.text: After considering multiple different blenders and reading lots of reviews, I chose this one, and I couldn't be happier. The blender is powerful enough to make green smoothies and crush ice, and the food processor attachment works better than the KitchenAid I had before. It's loud on the higher settings, but the tone is easier on the ears than my previous blender. This serves many purposes in one unit - just what I was looking for in my smaller kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Flint

customer_reviews.title: Jarden was nice and sent me a new one under the warranty ...
customer_reviews.text: Blender works well but the plastic base component which seals the bottom of the pitcher is very fragile. I owned the product for <1 year, using it 5x/wk, and the base cracked. Jarden was nice and sent me a new one under the warranty (though that took a couple weeks and several emails back and forth, including me having to send pictures of multiple product components, which was frustrating). I had the replacement bottom for six months and it shattered again the other day. Really disappointing. I emailed to get another one sent, but this is not something you should have to deal with if you shell out close to $100 for a blender. Be warned,
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Deemer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Oster!
customer_reviews.text: This blender/food processor rocks! I hand wash it after use to extend the life of all components. After use I rinse first, then fill with water to a third full and squirt a dash of soap and then blend on low for 30 seconds. I only take it apart for more thorough cleaning every two weeks. My washing cleans it well enough for killing germs. Also, this was a warehouse deal so I got and excellent price!
customer_reviews.author: ruthieo54

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: The blender is great! However, the lid for the food processor was shipped with a crack. I should have payed closer attention to the online reviews regarding how cheap & flimsy the plastic lid is. Sadly, I will be returning. I’m very disappointed since my last two blenders have been made Oster and have lasted me many years.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Makes quick work if processing food
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a blender that was more powerful than my standard mixer. I didn't need the power of a Vitamix or blendtec and certainly didn't want to pay the price. I have owned an Oster for 6 years and simply outgrew it. I love this. My smoothies came of smooth and the blender's smoothie option allowed me to walk away and know it would just properly. I love the smoothie cup accessory. Makes morning smoothies am easier and quicker process. I also used it to make coconut milk. I've been making it in my food processor. This time it came out much creamier. We'll see about durability.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Petric

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to review it because it's really the only ...
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to review it because it's really the only blender I've owned. And reviewing a blender is in and of itself somewhat difficult. It blends stuff, hasn't broken (I've had it for a couple of months and it gets regular use), so what can I say?... It does sometimes get air trapped on the bottom of the mixture, and the motor will all of a sudden run with no resistance, and I have to manually manipulate the material with an instrument, but this could be due to my own inexperience in how to use a blender properly (maybe I don't use enough liquid),
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its great, but broke and can't get replacement part.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cause I didn't want to have two separate machines taking up space in my kitchen. Its great, works great. Blender blends. However, the cheese grater/slicer part lost a piece and now won't mount and I've called and emailed and that part is not available, though I did read several other reviews that had the same problem. So now I have a blender and need another machine? Uff.
customer_reviews.author: dani d

customer_reviews.title: Oyster Blender pro 1200
customer_reviews.text: One of the best budget blenders out there. It has plenty of umps to make anything you want and it has a glass jar. In my opinion it's better than the ninja.
customer_reviews.author: mtdoramike

customer_reviews.title: Impossable to find replacement parts for the Pro 1200 food processor bowl.
customer_reviews.text: I have had my blender for a while, I love it and use it everyday. The two features I use is the food processor and the smoothie cut... However the food processor blade is stuck inside and I have been on multiple websites to try and find a new bowl and blade.... Nothing, I even went to oster website and nothing. I'm giving it a two star because finding replacement parts are impossible to find which means I have to buy another. However it won't be this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this blender! So far I have made green smoothies (no chunks of spinach or kale!), chickpea salad (perfect texture with the food processor), and some vegan cheese in the blender...everything has turned out excellent. Definitely worth it. No need to pay a ton for another blender when this one works so well.
customer_reviews.author: psych student

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny, such a great deal!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Finally a blender that doesn't cost a fortune and still does an amazing job. Glass carafe is great, made our smoothie with frozen strawberries and all, perfectly smooth. We've had a ninja and a nutribullet pro and a hamilton beach blender, we make a lot of smoothies and nut butters etc... All of the other did not do the job and the plastic carafes and cups never last. My toddler drank more of his smoothie than usual and I credit that to the smooth blending. Loving it!
customer_reviews.author: AlwaysWorking

customer_reviews.title: Great all around
customer_reviews.text: The first one died during the first usage, but it was super easy to return and get one that worked. Having used the item for a few months I can say I’m definitely happy with my purchase and would buy again/recommend! Used almost daily for making frozen fruit smoothies. The to-go cup is nice and large. Have also blended soups in the pitcher with ease. Also made pie crust and biscuits using the food processor. This is a great product for anyone on a budget who would like to save a bit of counter space. It’s a tad loud on full speed, but that’s a small price to pay IMHO.
customer_reviews.author: nightskywind83

customer_reviews.title: adequate for routine tasks
customer_reviews.text: This blender works adequately for making smoothies from frozen fruit, but it doesn't feel like a sturdy product. It doesn't mix food as thoroughy or as easily as I would like, and it is quite noisy when on high speed. Note that the version I got was offered with a food processor attachment which was worthless. I recommend sticking with the blender only. If you use a blender frequently, I think you'd be happier with a Vitamix (if you can afford one).
customer_reviews.author: zeozod

customer_reviews.title: Great combo for the price!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this primarily for smoothies and it exceeded my expectations. Using vegetables or fruits, the smoothies come out great...even with something stringy like celery. I've only used the food processor once but it worked very well. The blender works quite nicely...love the variety of blending options. No problems with leaks...just need to be sure the rubber ring is locked in. Parts clean up easily too.
customer_reviews.author: maureen

customer_reviews.title: Fine Blender terrible food processor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this specifically for the food processor, and I thought it would save space in my kitchen. The very first time I used it the food processor cup broke. The lid is completely stuck to it and I cannot get it off. If you are getting as a blender it works fine but don't buy it for the food processor. I have tried to find a replacement part for it, but all the reviews say the same thing, "the food processor cup is cheap and breaks easily". I'm going to purchase a different more sturdy food processor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I use it for frozen fruits to make smoothies
customer_reviews.text: This is very good for that particular use. I don't use the blender for anything else, but for the price this is a solid purchase. I have owned Ninja's in the past, and if you drop the blender container, they would break very easily. This product seems to hold up much much better. Blending power is every bit as good. Cleaning is fairly easy compared to other blenders. I have only had this for a couple months, but so far I am very satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: TKGopherFan

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.text: 2 years past. Unfortunately, my unit has broken down. I reached out to Oster's customer support to find a service since the unit is still under 3-year warranty. Surprisingly, they didn't provide an address. Instead, they just sent a completely new unit for free and an UPS label for the broken one to be sent to their warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old blender and it was important to me to have a glass blender and a powerful on too. This appliance is both. I am pleased with this it blends perfectly and quickly. I haven’t used all the attachments but I plan too. This product seems built to last through the years.
customer_reviews.author: Namiko Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good for smoothies and for food processing
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, haven't done anything too crazy with it yet, but great for smoothies and the food processor works well for salsa. Will note that the smoothie attachment is extremely hard to unscrew from the blades, so i've just been making the smoothies in the glass jug thingy and then pouring it into the smoothie to-go container.
customer_reviews.author: scustomers

customer_reviews.title: User Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of the least amount of parts and power quality. Both deliver. Love that there ARE NOT so many parts that you can't figure out how to put together. And love the power so that it does what you want it to. Good price and value. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Has problems getting a smooth blend on some ingredients
customer_reviews.text: So far this blender has been performing great for the most part. It has been leaving a few chunks of frozen fruits, so that's not ideal. And when blending carrots, kale and celery, the texture is gritty. Works beautifully on spinach on fresh fruit. Definitely not a Vitamix or other high class blender, but will do the trick if you're on a budget. It comes with a preset frozen/green smoothie option, but I've found letting it go for a while on high works better for most of my smoothie needs. I also like that it is easy to clean with 1/4 jar of hot water and only a couple drops of soap.
customer_reviews.author: bakerz

customer_reviews.title: Best value for the dollar
customer_reviews.text: This is really a 3-in1.... Blender, food processor and smoothie maker. Best value for the dollar! Would have preferred the brushed steel version but the 3-in-1 was only chrome... Looks fine on counter. Love the pulsing smoothie blending feature and the on off switch. Nice wide top in blender. Haven't used the food processor yet but look forward to that.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Y

customer_reviews.title: Broken Blade Assembly. 3 months light use
customer_reviews.text: I've only ever used this blender for bulletproof coffee, which isn't exactly heavy duty, and after 3 months of light use the bottom plastic on the pitcher snapped when I lifted it out of the base splashing scalding coffee everywhere. It's really sad that it has this major flaw. The pitcher is nice thick glass, the base sturdy, and the engine powerful. I've reached out to customer service and will adjust this review based on their response.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Morris

customer_reviews.title: Solid Blender/Food Processor Combo
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a blender and food processor combo to save some space, and I have not been disappointed with this one. My only complaint, which other reviewers have mentioned, is the sound. It is quite loud, and I sometimes worry I am waking up my apartment neighbors when I make smoothies in the morning. Other than that, I have never had any issues using this blender and it always seems to have the attachment/setting I need for my recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Craig

customer_reviews.title: Broke in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this processor less than a year ago and it's not working anymore. Needless to say I am not happy with it. I had an old Oster food processor that was working for almost 20 years, was simple and convenient to use and clean. Do not waste your money on this creation. Next time I am buying any household item in Costco, if it doesn't work you can simply return it and get your money back.
customer_reviews.author: Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great Blender
customer_reviews.text: I was very picky when buying a new system and decided on this item. It is a great system and we love the blender travel cup, and all the different modes. We bought it primarily for shakes and smoothies. The only thing, and I never considered when looking, It is REALLY loud. Its become a family joke because its so loud. Despite the noise I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of boys

customer_reviews.title: It gets the job done!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for a couple of months. I replaced a Vitamix that died after 6 years of hard labor with this Oster. Initially, I was not impressed with the silver plastic housing for the motor and the way the blender danced around on the counter when in operation. I almost sent it back, but decided to give it a few more tries since the reviews I read were so good. A friend also highly recommended it. I haven't used it as a food processor yet so can't comment on that. As a blender, it gets the job done and only time will tell if it proves to be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ocean Grover

product_meta.title: Oster Blender | Pro 1200 with Glass Jar, 24-Ounce Smoothie Cup and Food Processor Attachment, Brushed Nickel - BLSTMB-CBF-000
product_meta.description:
Oster Pro 1200 PLUS Blend N Go Smoothie Cup & Food Processor Attachment Brushed Nickel Glass 

You can make everything fresh and delicious with the Oster Pro 1200 Plus' versatility and performance. The powerful motor starts up with 1200 watts of power that consistently crushes ice, pulverizes greens and turns frozen fruit into a smooth sorbet. Seven speeds including 3 pre programmed Smart Settings; take the guess work out of blending and food prep, providing simple one touch controls for salsas, milkshakes and smoothies at the touch of a button. Featuring a 50 percent larger blade system (compared to previous Oster blender models) and patented Dual Direction Blade Technology; that blends in forward and reverse motion, optimizing blade power and allowing ingredients to move down into the jar for faster, easier blending; 5 cup BPA free food processing bowl, stainless steel slicing disk and chopping blade; 24 ounce Blend N Go; cup included. Better Blending Tip:Cut up fresh fruit ingredients and freeze in individual portions, then just grab out of the freezer and blend up a smoothie in no time.
feature_bullets: The oster pro 1200 blender plus food processor starts with 1200 powerful watts, and lets you use the blender and food processor features interchangeably to make everything from smoothies to salsa to soup with ease
Blender and food chopper feature smart settings technology and 7 speeds, including 3 pre programmed settings for 1 touch salsas, milkshakes, and smoothies, plus pulse for added control and precision

Dual direction blade technology blends in forward and reverse, allowing ingredients to flow down into the blade easier for faster and smoother results; the powerful and precise blade system is 50 percent larger compared to previous oster blenders
Comes with an 6 cup boroclass glass jar; extra large, bpa free 5 cup food processing bowl; stainless steel slicing disk and chopping blade; and 24 ounce lidded smoothie to go cup
10 year duralast all metal drive limited warranty for longevity; 900 watts of ice crushing power
Premium stainless steel finish for an elegant, modern look; Cord length : 16 Inches

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars3,409 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
